relevance_explanation: The trimmed routine includes only the steps relevant to the customer based on their data. The loyalty points are acknowledged. Since the booking is not cancellable, steps related to checking blockers, calculating fees, processing cancellations or refunds were all removed as they were not relevant.
completeness_explanation: The trimmed routine preserves all necessary logic that applies to this customer including retrieving booking data, and handling the case where cancellation is not allowed before terminating the case.
